request.description:
**Endpoint**: GET /Express_movement

**Description**: Returns ListWarehouses

**FULL URL**: [http://api.adempiere.io](http://api.adempiere.io/api)/express-movement/warehouses

**Method**: GET

**Application Example**

``` bash
curl --location 'http://api.adempiere.io/express-movement/warehouses' \
--header 'Authorization: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJqdGkiOiIxMDAwMTQ5IiwiQURfQ2xpZW50X0lEIjoxMSwiQURfT3JnX0lEIjowLCJBRF9Sb2xlX0lEIjoxMDIsIkFEX1VzZXJfSUQiOjEwMCwiTV9XYXJlaG91c2VfSUQiOjAsIkFEX0xhbmd1YWdlIjoiZW5fVVMiLCJpYXQiOjE3MTA1MTA0MDEsImV4cCI6MTcxMDU5NjgwMX0.nYQbrcT9RyHNRCf-oNM50ZVSO6uJ9gvrQQ7e0fzU9Ik'

 ```

**Example Answer**

``` json
{
    "record_count": "11",
    "records": [
        {
            "id": 103,
            "value": "HQ",
            "name": "HQ Warehouse",
            "description": ""
        },
        {
            "id": 104,
            "value": "Store Central",
            "name": "Store Central",
            "description": ""
        },
        {
            "id": 50000,
            "value": "HQT",
            "name": "HQ Transit",
            "description": ""
        },
        {
            "id": 50001,
            "value": "Furniture",
            "name": "Furniture",
            "description": "Furniture"
        },
        {
            "id": 50002,
            "value": "Fertilizer",
            "name": "Fertilizer",
            "description": "Fertilizer"
        },
        {
            "id": 50003,
            "value": "Store North",
            "name": "Store North",
            "description": ""
        },
        {
            "id": 50004,
            "value": "Store South",
            "name": "Store South",
            "description": ""
        },
        {
            "id": 50005,
            "value": "Store East",
            "name": "Store East",
            "description": ""
        },
        {
            "id": 50006,
            "value": "Store West",
            "name": "Store West",
            "description": ""
        },
        {
            "id": 50007,
            "value": "FertilizerT",
            "name": "Fertilizer Transit",
            "description": "Fertilizer Transit"
        },
        {
            "id": 50008,
            "value": "FurnitureT",
            "name": "Furniture Transit",
            "description": "Furniture Transit"
        }
    ],
    "next_page_token": ""
}

 ```

| **Version** | date | author | Description of Changes |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| 1.0 | 15/03/2024 | Ricardo | Initial creation of the document. |

request.description:
**Endpoint**: GET /Express_movement

**Description**: Returns ListProducts

**FULL URL**: [http://api.adempiere.io/](http://api.adempiere.io/api)express-movement/products

**Method**: GET

**Application Example**

``` bash
curl --location 'http://api.adempiere.io/express-movement/products' \
--header 'Authorization: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJqdGkiOiIxMDAwMTQ5IiwiQURfQ2xpZW50X0lEIjoxMSwiQURfT3JnX0lEIjowLCJBRF9Sb2xlX0lEIjoxMDIsIkFEX1VzZXJfSUQiOjEwMCwiTV9XYXJlaG91c2VfSUQiOjAsIkFEX0xhbmd1YWdlIjoiZW5fVVMiLCJpYXQiOjE3MTA1MTA0MDEsImV4cCI6MTcxMDU5NjgwMX0.nYQbrcT9RyHNRCf-oNM50ZVSO6uJ9gvrQQ7e0fzU9Ik'

 ```

**Example Answer**

``` json
{
    "record_count": "1",
    "records": [
        {
            "id": 50004,
            "upc": "",
            "sku": "",
            "value": "Seat",
            "name": "Seat",
            "description": ""
        },
    ]
}

 ```

**Change control**

| **Version** | date | author | Description of Changes |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| 1.0 | 15/03/2024 | Ricardo | Initial creation of the document. |

request.description:
**Endpoint**: POST /Express_movement

**Description**: Returns Movement

**FULL URL**: [http://api.adempiere.io](http://api.adempiere.io/api)/express-movement/movements

**Parameters**: POST

**Application Example**

``` bash
curl --location --request POST 'http://api.adempiere.io/express-movement/movements' \
--header 'Authorization: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJqdGkiOiIxMDAwMTQ5IiwiQURfQ2xpZW50X0lEIjoxMSwiQURfT3JnX0lEIjowLCJBRF9Sb2xlX0lEIjoxMDIsIkFEX1VzZXJfSUQiOjEwMCwiTV9XYXJlaG91c2VfSUQiOjAsIkFEX0xhbmd1YWdlIjoiZW5fVVMiLCJpYXQiOjE3MTA1MTA0MDEsImV4cCI6MTcxMDU5NjgwMX0.nYQbrcT9RyHNRCf-oNM50ZVSO6uJ9gvrQQ7e0fzU9Ik'

 ```

**Example Answer**

``` json
{
    "id": 1000001,
    "document_no": "10000001",
    "movement_date": "2024-03-06T04:00:00Z",
    "description": "",
    "is_completed": false
}

 ```

**Common mistakes**

- no moves made
    

``` json
{
    "code": 13,
    "message": "Organization",
    "details": []
}

 ```

**Change control**

| **Version** | date | author | Description of Changes |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| 1.0 | 15/03/2024 | Ricardo | Initial creation of the document. |

**Endpoint**: DELETE /Express_movement

**Description**: Returns Empty

**FULL URL**: [http://api.adempiere.io](http://api.adempiere.io/api)/express-movement/movements

**Method**: DELETE

**Parameters (Params):**

- id (Int32, Mandatory)
    

**Application Example**

``` bash
curl --location --request DELETE 'http://api.adempiere.io/express-movement/movements/1000001' \
--header 'Authorization: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJqdGkiOiIxMDAwMTQ5IiwiQURfQ2xpZW50X0lEIjoxMSwiQURfT3JnX0lEIjowLCJBRF9Sb2xlX0lEIjoxMDIsIkFEX1VzZXJfSUQiOjEwMCwiTV9XYXJlaG91c2VfSUQiOjAsIkFEX0xhbmd1YWdlIjoiZW5fVVMiLCJpYXQiOjE3MTA1MTA0MDEsImV4cCI6MTcxMDU5NjgwMX0.nYQbrcT9RyHNRCf-oNM50ZVSO6uJ9gvrQQ7e0fzU9Ik'

 ```

**Example Answer**

``` json
{}

 ```

**Common mistakes**

- the id does not match a movement
    

``` json
{
    "code": 13,
    "message": "Inventory Move * Not found *",
    "details": []
}

 ```

**Change control**

| **Version** | date | author | Description of Changes |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| 1.0 | 15/03/2024 | Ricardo | Initial creation of the document. |

**Endpoint**: POST /Express_movement

**Description**: Returns Movement

**FULL URL**: [http://api.adempiere.io/](http://api.adempiere.io/api)express-movement/movements/{id}/process

**Method**: POST

**Parameters (Params):**

- id (Int32, Mandatory)
    

**Parameters (Body):**

- description (String, optional)
    

**Application Example**

``` bash
curl --location 'http://api.adempiere.io/express-movement/movements/1000002/process' \
--header 'Content-Type: application/json' \
--header 'Authorization: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJqdGkiOiIxMDAwMTQ5IiwiQURfQ2xpZW50X0lEIjoxMSwiQURfT3JnX0lEIjowLCJBRF9Sb2xlX0lEIjoxMDIsIkFEX1VzZXJfSUQiOjEwMCwiTV9XYXJlaG91c2VfSUQiOjAsIkFEX0xhbmd1YWdlIjoiZW5fVVMiLCJpYXQiOjE3MTA1MTA0MDEsImV4cCI6MTcxMDU5NjgwMX0.nYQbrcT9RyHNRCf-oNM50ZVSO6uJ9gvrQQ7e0fzU9Ik' \
--data '{
    "description":"asd"
}'

 ```

**Example Answer**

``` json
{
    "id": 1000003,
    "document_no": "10000003",
    "movement_date": "2024-03-06T04:00:00Z",
    "description": "",
    "is_completed": true
}

 ```

**Common mistakes**

- the id does not match an inventory movement
    

``` json
{
    "code": 13,
    "message": "Inventory Move * Not found *",
    "details": []
}

 ```

**Change control**

| **Version** | date | author | Description of Changes |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| 1.0 | 15/03/2024 | Ricardo | Initial creation of the document. |

**Endpoint**: POST /Express_movement

**Description**: Returns MovementLine

**FULL URL**: [http://api.adempiere.io/](http://api.adempiere.io/api)express-movement/movements/{movement_id}/lines

**Method**: POST

**Parameters (Params):**

- movement_id (Int32, Mandatory)
    

**Parametros (Body):**

- warehouse_id (Int32, optional)
- warehouse_to_id (Int32, optional)
- description (String, optional)
- product_id (Int32, optional)
- quantity (String, optional)
    

**Application Example**

``` bash
curl --location 'http://api.adempiere.io/express-movement/movements/1000003/lines' \
--header 'Content-Type: application/json' \
--header 'Authorization: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJqdGkiOiIxMDAwMTQ5IiwiQURfQ2xpZW50X0lEIjoxMSwiQURfT3JnX0lEIjowLCJBRF9Sb2xlX0lEIjoxMDIsIkFEX1VzZXJfSUQiOjEwMCwiTV9XYXJlaG91c2VfSUQiOjAsIkFEX0xhbmd1YWdlIjoiZW5fVVMiLCJpYXQiOjE3MTA1MTA0MDEsImV4cCI6MTcxMDU5NjgwMX0.nYQbrcT9RyHNRCf-oNM50ZVSO6uJ9gvrQQ7e0fzU9Ik' \
--data '{
    "warehouse_id":103,
    "warehouse_to_id":104,
    "description":"prueba",
    "product_id":50004,
    "quantity":"prueba"
}'

 ```

**Example Answer**

``` json
{
    "id": 1000000,
    "warehouse_id": 0,
    "warehouse_to_id": 0,
    "product": {
        "id": 50004,
        "upc": "",
        "sku": "",
        "value": "Seat",
        "name": "Seat",
        "description": ""
    },
    "description": "",
    "quantity": "1",
    "line": 10
}

 ```

**Common mistakes**

- M_WarehouseTo_ID id missing
    

``` json
{
    "code": 13,
    "message": "Fill mandatory fields:  M_WarehouseTo_ID",
    "details": []
}

 ```

- warehouse id missing
    

``` json
{
    "code": 13,
    "message": "Fill mandatory fields:  Warehouse",
    "details": []
}

 ```

- product id missing
    

``` json
{
    "code": 13,
    "message": "Fill mandatory fields:  Product",
    "details": []
}

 ```

- the id does not match any inventory movement
    

``` json
{
    "code": 13,
    "message": "Inventory Move * Not found *",
    "details": []
}

 ```

**Change control**

| **Version** | date | author | Description of Changes |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| 1.0 | 15/03/2024 | Ricardo | Initial creation of the document. |

**Endpoint**: DELETE /Express_movement

**Description**: Returns Empty

**FULL URL**: [http://api.adempiere.io/](http://api.adempiere.io/api)express-movement/movements/{movement_id}/lines

**Method**: DELETE

**Parameters (Params):**

- movement_id (Int32, Mandatory)
- id (Int32, Mandatory)
    

**Application Example**

``` bash
curl --location --request DELETE 'http://api.adempiere.io/express-movement/movement/1000003/lines/1000001' \
--header 'Authorization: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJqdGkiOiIxMDAwMTQ5IiwiQURfQ2xpZW50X0lEIjoxMSwiQURfT3JnX0lEIjowLCJBRF9Sb2xlX0lEIjoxMDIsIkFEX1VzZXJfSUQiOjEwMCwiTV9XYXJlaG91c2VfSUQiOjAsIkFEX0xhbmd1YWdlIjoiZW5fVVMiLCJpYXQiOjE3MTA1MTA0MDEsImV4cCI6MTcxMDU5NjgwMX0.nYQbrcT9RyHNRCf-oNM50ZVSO6uJ9gvrQQ7e0fzU9Ik'

 ```

**Example Answer**

``` json
{}

 ```

**Common mistakes**

- the id field has an invalid value
    

``` json
{
    "code": 13,
    "message": "Fill mandatory fields:  Move Line",
    "details": []
}

 ```

- the movement id does not exist
    

``` json
{
    "code": 13,
    "message": "Move Line * Not found *",
    "details": []
}

 ```

**Change control**

| **Version** | date | author | Description of Changes |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| 1.0 | 15/03/2024 | Ricardo | Initial creation of the document. |

**Endpoint**: PATCH /Express_movement

**Description**: Returns MovementLine

**FULL URL**: [http://api.adempiere.io/](http://api.adempiere.io/api)express-movement/movement/{movement_id}/lines/{id}

**Method**: PATCH

**Parameters (Params):**

- movement_id (Int32, Mandatory)
- id (Int32, Mandatory)
    

**Parametros (Body):**

- description (String, optional)
- quantity (String, optional)
    

**Application Example**

``` bash
curl --location --request PATCH 'http://api.adempiere.io/express-movement/movement/10000007/lines/1000003' \
--header 'Content-Type: application/json' \
--header 'Authorization: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJqdGkiOiIxMDAwMTQ5IiwiQURfQ2xpZW50X0lEIjoxMSwiQURfT3JnX0lEIjowLCJBRF9Sb2xlX0lEIjoxMDIsIkFEX1VzZXJfSUQiOjEwMCwiTV9XYXJlaG91c2VfSUQiOjAsIkFEX0xhbmd1YWdlIjoiZW5fVVMiLCJpYXQiOjE3MTA1MTA0MDEsImV4cCI6MTcxMDU5NjgwMX0.nYQbrcT9RyHNRCf-oNM50ZVSO6uJ9gvrQQ7e0fzU9Ik' \
--data '{
    "description":"prueba",
    "quantity":"prueba"
}'

 ```

**Example Answer**

``` json
{
    "id": 1000003,
    "warehouse_id": 104,
    "warehouse_to_id": 0,
    "product": {
        "id": 50004,
        "upc": "",
        "sku": "",
        "value": "Seat",
        "name": "Seat",
        "description": ""
    },
    "description": "",
    "quantity": "1",
    "line": 20
}

 ```

**Common mistakes**

- the id field has an invalid value
    

``` json
{
    "code": 13,
    "message": "Fill mandatory fields:  Move Line",
    "details": []
}

 ```

- the movement id does not exist
    

``` json
{
    "code": 13,
    "message": "Move Line * Not found *",
    "details": []
}

 ```

**Change control**

| **Version** | date | author | Description of Changes |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| 1.0 | 15/03/2024 | Ricardo | Initial creation of the document. |

**Endpoint**: GET /Express_movement

**Description**: Returns ListMovementLines

**FULL URL**: [http://api.adempiere.io](http://api.adempiere.io/api)/express-movement/{movement_id}/movements/lines

**Method**: GET

**Parameters (Params):**

- movement_id (Int32, Mandatory)
    

**Application Example**

``` bash
curl --location 'http://api.adempiere.io/express-movement/1000003/movements/lines' \
--header 'Authorization: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJqdGkiOiIxMDAwMTQ5IiwiQURfQ2xpZW50X0lEIjoxMSwiQURfT3JnX0lEIjowLCJBRF9Sb2xlX0lEIjoxMDIsIkFEX1VzZXJfSUQiOjEwMCwiTV9XYXJlaG91c2VfSUQiOjAsIkFEX0xhbmd1YWdlIjoiZW5fVVMiLCJpYXQiOjE3MTA1MTA0MDEsImV4cCI6MTcxMDU5NjgwMX0.nYQbrcT9RyHNRCf-oNM50ZVSO6uJ9gvrQQ7e0fzU9Ik'

 ```
